keywords: ['classical hindustani song', 'sitar', 'tabla', 'no other instruments', 'no voices', 'moderate tempo']
caption: This classical Hindustani song features the sitar playing the main melody. Open strings are continuously played with fretted strings providing the main melody of this song. This is accompanied by a tabla playing a classical rhythm. There are no other instruments in this song. There are no voices in this song. This song can be played for an Indian traditional dance.
